# GitHub Copilot Instructions

- Always write texts and messages in a clear and concise manner that is easy to understand in English.
- Use proper grammar, punctuation, and spelling in all generated content.
- Avoid using jargon, slang, or overly complex vocabulary unless specifically requested.
- When generating code comments or documentation, ensure they accurately describe the functionality and purpose of the code.
- Maintain a neutral and professional tone in all communications.---
